title: Council Regulation (EC) No 2819/95 of 5 December 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1101/89 on structural improvements in inland waterway transport
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No  2819/95 of 5 December 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1101/89 on structural improvements in  inland waterway transport
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official  Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 December 1995.
For the Council The President J. A. GRIÑÁN
